The Construcciones Aeronáuticas SA (or CASA) CN-235 is medium range airliner and military transport.

In-Game

There are 2 planes currently in circulation as of the time of writing.

Specs

Construcciones Aeronáuticas SA CN-235 (Real-life)[1]
CN-235
Length 21.40 m (70 ft 2.5 in)
Wingspan 25.81 m (84 ft 8 in)
Height 8.18 m (26 ft 10 in)
Engines General Electric CT7-93

Trivia

  • This plane was also developed by Indonesian Aerospace, who is developing a newer passenger variant.
  • There are about 30 countries who operate the military variant.
